title: Fast and Furious gun scandal to become major Hollywood movie
text:
'Fast and Furious' gun scandal to become major Hollywood movie 
Washington Times Saturday 24th October, 2015 
John Dodson heard the news. Brian Terry, a U.S. Border patrol agent, had been killed by bandits wielding guns that could be traced back to an Obama administration initiative meant to track Mexican drug cartels through illegal firearms sales. The practice was known as ';gunwalking'; and the covert program was named ';Operation Fast and Furious.';After much soul searching, and with the encouragement of then-CBS investigative journalist...
